transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello?

Customer: Haan ji.

Executive: Sir, Awaz baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se.

Customer: Haan ji.

Executive: Ye maine aapko video meet ki link share kari hai.

Customer: Check kariye.

Executive: Yes sir.

Executive: Aapka t-shirt aaya tha na video meet ke liye?

Customer: [unintelligible]

Executive: [unintelligible] Agarwal 9271@gmail.com.

Customer: Mail receive hua sir aapko?

Executive: Nahi, ye sundar hai.

Customer: Sir, ho to gaya.

Customer: Hello.

Executive: Ji boliye.

Customer: Sir, ye whatsapp pe, message pe, mail pe, in total nahi ho pa raha hai.

Executive: Haan, mail pe.

Customer: Whatsapp me mujhe ek baar hi likhiye mere wale number pe.

Executive: Yes sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to access link on WhatsApp/mail.



Resolution:

- Executive asked customer to send 'Hi' on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- video meet, link, whatsapp, mail
